title: MINECRAFT咋崩掉了？
author: LittleHei
txt_content:
我就是想问一下，为啥我今天添加了战争MOD就崩掉了。求解答！
 Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to E:\Users\qianxuanhao\Desktop\整合\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-01-24_19.10.18-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: zhenyanwang1
replies.txt_content: 你下载的那个CONTENT PACK？是不是文件不完整？

replies.author: MICMICMIC
replies.txt_content: 试试在桌面－右键－属性－设置－高级－疑难解答－把那个“全，无”往后托3格－确定～  ～～再看看吧～
